clinical_study.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety of Kukoamine B Mesilate in Sepsis Patients
clinical_study.official_title: Efficacy and Safety of Kukoamine B Mesilate in Sepsis Patients: a Multicentre, Randomised, Double-blind, Placebo-controlled, Phase 2 Trial

brief_summary.textblock: Phase II study of Kukoamine B Mesilate in Sepsis Patients

detailed_description.textblock: To Assess Efficacy,Safety,Pharmacokinetics of Kukoamine B Mesilate in Sepsis Patients

primary_outcome.time_frame: Day 8 after the first dose (Within 24 hours after the last dose on day 7)
primary_outcome.description: Change in SOFA scale from baseline.

secondary_outcome.description: Proportion of patients with 28-day all-cause deaths and continuing ICU stay after the first dose.

secondary_outcome.measure: Proportion of patients with 7-day all-cause deaths
secondary_outcome.description: Proportion of patients with 7-day all-cause deaths after first dose.

secondary_outcome.measure: Proportion of patients transferred out of ICU
secondary_outcome.description: Proportion of patients transferred out of ICU within 7 days after first dose.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 2, 4 , 8 after the first dose (Within 24 hours after the last dose on day 7)
secondary_outcome.description: Change of IL-6 from baseline on day 2,4,8 after first dose (Within 24 hours after the last dose on day 7).
Change in SOFA scale from baseline on day 1,3 ,5 after first dose.

secondary_outcome.measure: Duration of use and abstention of life support treatment
secondary_outcome.description: Duration of use and abstention of life support treatment (vasoactive drugs, mechanical ventilation, CRRT) .

secondary_outcome.measure: Duration of ICU stay and absence
secondary_outcome.description: Duration of ICU stay and absence within 28 days after the first dose.

secondary_outcome.measure: Rate of adverse events/serious adverse events
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From date of singing informed consent until the 29 days after the first dose
secondary_outcome.description: Observe all the participants in any adverse events occurred during the period of clinical research, including clinical symptoms and signs of life, an abnormal in laboratory tests, record its clinical characteristics, severity, occurrence time, duration, treatment and prognosis, and determine its and the correlation between test drugs. CTCAE v5.0 standard was used to evaluate drug safety.

other_outcome.measure: Area under the curve at steady state (AUCss)
Peak plasma concentration at steady state (Cmaxss)
Trough plasma concentration at steady state (Cminss)
Correlation between the exposure of Kukoamine B Mesilate and its efficacy
other_outcome.time_frame: Day 8 after the first dose (Within 24 hours after the last dose on day 7)
other_outcome.description: Correlation between the exposure of Kukoamine B Mesilate and change in SOFA scale from baseline.

other_outcome.measure: Correlation between the exposure of Kukoamine B Mesilate and hepatic-related treatment-related adverse events
other_outcome.description: Correlation between the exposure of Kukoamine B Mesilate and hepatic-related treatment-related adverse events of interest as assessed by CTCAE v5.0.
